revised_title: Computational Study of Butanol Isomers Adsorption on Silicalite and H-ZSM-5
tldr: The authors used computational methods, including energy minimization and Monte Carlo/molecular dynamics algorithms, to study the adsorption of butanol isomers on silicalite and H-ZSM-5 zeolites. They found that all butanol isomers have similar adsorption energies and sites, and that pore-confinement effects play a role in the adsorption process.
